Communal workshop for
motorcycle enthusiasts
based in Berlin

Build, share and learn

Craftstatt is a friendly and inclusive community of bikers. It’s a place where builders of all skill levels are welcome to share their passion for these amazing machines. Wether it’s just to change your oil, filters and tires or to build your own dream bike. Craftstatt will provide you with the space, tools, hydrolic lift bays and the knowledge, all in the wonderful city of Berlin.

Get Involved

We'd love to have you onboard! Leave your details below to stay in the loop about future updates.
